question: A hillside along a highway has exposed layers of undisturbed sedimentary rock. Which method would be best for scientists to use to determine the relative age of these sedimentary rock layers?
candidate_answers: (A) apply the law of superposition (B) calculate the rate of radiometric decay (C) apply the law of crosscutting relationships (D) calculate the rate of tectonic plate movement
answer: calculate the rate of radiometric decay
label: B
